amendment.description: To improve a provision relating to loans to purchasers of highly fractionated land.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2440 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2440 proposed by Senator Akaka. (consideration: CR S4266; text: CR S4266) To improve a provision relating to loans to purchasers of highly fractionated land.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2440 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2440 proposed by Senator Akaka.
